helpText: å_Edit, delete, or reorder categories in your organization______________________________ø.

generic.title: å_Error updating categories__________________________ø
generic.message: å_Something went wrong. Please try again later________________________ø.

maxDepthExceeded.title: å_Error updating categories__________________________ø
maxDepthExceeded.message: å_You cannot nest categories more than 2 levels deep___________________________ø.

destinationHasSameName.title: å_Error updating categories__________________________ø
destinationHasSameName.message: å_A category with the same name already exists in the destination category______________________________________ø.

noSchema.title: å_Schema not found_________________ø
noSchema.message: å_Item schema not found for user_________________ø.

maxCharacter.title: å_Error updating categories__________________________ø
maxCharacter.message: å_Category names can be a maximum of ${maxCharacter} characters long___________________________________ø.

deleteInUseCategory.title: å_Delete category________________ø
deleteInUseCategory.message: å_${numItem} items are assigned to this category. Deleting the category will also remove it from these items_______________________________________________________ø.

custom.title: å_Custom categories__________________ø
custom.message: å_Create your own categories to organize content within your organization_____________________________________ø.

arcgis.title: å_ArcGIS categories__________________ø
arcgis.message: å_ArcGIS categories include a selection of topic categories and subcategories that can be used to categorize many types of geospatial content. These categories are used to support ArcGIS Living Atlas of the World___________________________________________________________________________________________________________ø.

iso.title: å_ISO categories_______________ø
iso.message: å_ISO categories includes topic categories from the International Organization for Standardization that provide a method for describing and cataloging geographic information_______________________________________________________________________________________ø.

inspire.title: å_INSPIRE categories___________________ø
inspire.message: å_INSPIRE categories include a comprehensive set of spatial data themes set out in the INSPIRE Directive_____________________________________________________ø.
